record.text:
Paul is having the best time out there roiling and frolicking! 😂🎉

It's so nice to see the canals filling right back up!🌊😁 

Splish splash he's taking a bath! 🛀🥰

What a miracle that it rained blood, too - Paul's favorite! 🩸🫶💕

post.text:

record.text:
Did you see that, @thebluewizard.bsky.social ?!

We did a big loop around the mountains and saw these red clouds back over the village. This made Ruby Dragon so mad and we came back and did a second pass!

I could hardly see as we DOVE down, blood rain in my eyes!!

1/2

record.text:
My beautiful family - they're back!! By some miracle of The Big Tree they survived in the belly of the terrible serpent, by floating in a cauldron! 🙏🌳

They survived off of stew!! 🫕😢

record.text: Find the sorceress! She must pay for what she’s done to our village!! 😡

post.text: Find the sorceress! She must pay for what she’s done to our village!! 😡

record.text:
All I ever wanted was for my beloved sea serpents to have nice comfortable fulfilling lives at the expense of the miserable dirty villagers who I don’t think are worth very much! Is that ok?!?!

Guess not! So nice work now there’s only one serpent left… but don’t worry, she’s pregnant! 🥰

Bye 👋

I saw that! Careful up there! I am countering the Blood Rain - for now! Those creatures seem to be growing stronger from it, still!

Then @therubydragon.bsky.social grabbed one of those nasty serpents in their talons. It seemed way bigger than before! 

Ruby Dragon then swung it around by the tail in circles and I SWEAR I saw people fly out of it's mouth and land in the canal. 

Then the serpent got FLUNG into a cliffside!

2/2
